hero.headline: Earn 8-11% Backed by American Real Estate
hero.description: Discover the stability of Single-Family Residential (SFR) Notes. Secured debt investments that offer consistent monthly income without the headaches of being a landlord.

items.title: Secured by Real Estate
items.description: Your investment is collateralized by the underlying property. If a borrower defaults, the asset backs your principal, providing a safety net stocks can't offer.

items.title: Passive Income Stream
items.description: Receive monthly interest payments directly to your account. Enjoy the cash flow of real estate without tenants, toilets, or trash.

items.title: AI-Vetted Opportunities
items.description: Our proprietary AI analyzes 50+ data points including local market trends and borrower history to grade every note before it hits the marketplace.

comparisonSection.title: Bank Model vs. Investor Model
comparisonSection.description: Why let the bank keep the profits? See how direct note investing shifts the advantage to you by cutting out the middleman.

traditionalBanking.title: Traditional Banking
traditionalBanking.subtitle: You are the depositor. The bank leverages your money.

directInvesting.title: Direct Note Investing
directInvesting.subtitle: You are the bank. You own the debt asset directly.

steps.title: Browse & Select
steps.description: Explore our marketplace of pre-vetted notes. Filter by yield, location, LTV, and term length to find your match.

steps.title: Digital Due Diligence
steps.description: Review all documents, property valuations, and title reports instantly online. Complete the purchase with a secure digital signing.

steps.title: Earn Monthly
steps.description: Sit back as interest payments are deposited into your account every month. Track performance via your investor dashboard.

leadCapture.title: Access Exclusive Note Inventory
leadCapture.subtitle: Create your free account to view detailed financials and start investing today.
leadCapture.accreditedLabel: I am an accredited investor. (Optional - required for certain note classes)
leadCapture.disclaimer: By clicking above, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
